EMAIL_IS_TAKEN: The email provided is already associated with an existing account.
CANNOT_CHANGE_TO_SAME_STATE: The account you are trying to modify already has such state.
ACCOUNT_WAS_DELETED: The account was previously deleted. If you wish to login you will need to create a new account.
PASSWORD_IS_WEAK: The password you provided is weak.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You have exceeded the rate limit. Please try again later.
TOO_MANY_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS: Too many login attempts. Please wait at least 5 minutes before trying again.
